TopicTitle: Anima Lunae - Escapecraft, Orbiter (just) - 100 percent stock

Articles.Content:
17 solid fuel boosters, 4 liquid fuel engines with 14 fuel tanks, an extra gimbaled liquid with 3 more fuel tanks - all for something that will barely make orbit! Or maybe it\'s just the fact that I am positively unable to steer. At all. Ever.

On The Launchpad

Don\'t be fooled by the name - this is NOT a moon lander and I would be positively surprised, if not quite shocked, if anyone actually made a full Mun trip. Just in case you do, however, it has some RCS to get you back. Just in case.

SAS included as standard.

EDIT: Fixed image, not sure why it wasn\'t working.
